Event.name: Working_a_post
Event.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is assigned to a <fen>Post</fen> where he or she performs a task associated with that <fen>Post</fen>. Alternatively, the <fen>Agent</fen> is expressed as acting with respect to a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> associated with the task. In most cases the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is located at the <fen>Post</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Volunteers</fex> were <t>staffing</t> <fex name="Salient_entity">the telephones</fex>.</ex>
<ex><t>Man</t> <fex name="Post">your stations</fex>! <fex name="Agent">CNI</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is assigned to a <fen>Post</fen> to perform a task involving a <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Agent</fen> staffs the <fen>Post</fen>.
<ex><t>Working</t> the front desk <fex name="Place">at a real estate office</fex> is not as fulfilling as it might seem.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which the <fen>Agent</fen> works at the <fen>Post</fen>.
<ex>We will be <t>staffing</t> a booth <fex name="Purpose">to let everyone know about our upcoming events.</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> works at the <fen>Post</fen>.
<ex>Police manned the border <fex name="Time">from 3 to 5pm</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the Means by which the <fen>Agent</fen> works at the Post.
<ex>Jason <t>manned</t> the booth <fex name="Means">by handing out brochures and greeting visitors.</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>).
<ex>Thanks to our volunteers for <fex name="Manner">tirelessly</fex> <t>manning</t> the entrance all night.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Frequency</fen> with which the <fen>Agent</fen> works in a given period of time.</def-root>

Arg.name: Period_of_iterations
Arg.definition: <def-root>The length of time from when the event denoted by the target began to be repeated to when it stopped.</def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the Explanation causes the state of affairs expressed by the target, but not in all cases. </def-root>

Arg.name: Event_description
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE gives a description of the working event.</def-root>

Arg.name: Post
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Post</fen> is a location or station assigned to the <fen>Agent</fen> where a task or tasks are to be performed.
<ex>Sue was <t>staffing</t> <fex name="pos">the entrance</fex> when everything started to go wrong.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Salient_entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is centrally involved in the task the <fen>Agent</fen> is assigned to perform. It is normally located at the <fen>Post</fen>.
<ex>You'll be <t>working</t> <fex name="sal">the phones</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: man.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: work at an assigned location.

lexUnit.name: work.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: perform a duty at an assigned location.
